message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal for both of us, as it's well below my asking price and still gives you a good margin. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm looking to save even more money. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. Can you consider this price?

Bob, I appreciate you coming down on your price, but I'm still not there yet.  I'm willing to meet you halfway at $10,750. This is a fair price for both of us, considering the value of the product.  Let's make this deal happen!
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still looking to save some more. I'm willing to pay $9,800 for the product. Can you consider this price?
